data.title: Great service!
data.text: The food was great. Restaurant clean. Awesome location. The manager Ryan is the best. Very helpful, and friendly. I wanted raw onions so he chopped some up for me and then after I ate half of my burrito it fell apart and he re-wrapped it for me. Super friendly. Great service. I'll definitely be back. Hopefully next time I won't be as much trouble! Haha. Thanks guys. Great job.

data.title: Good food and service
data.text: The Knockout Tacos are great! The Mad Rancher was good, and the Two Timer was one of the best tacos ever. I wasn't a big fan of The Gladiator though. Definitely want to come here again and just get 3 Two Timers. Good experience overall.

data.title: Qdoba Rapido!
data.text: This place is fine for a quick meal.  It's definitely a take on Chipotle but with a slightly different menu.  Our 10 year old son loves the place so instead of paying $50 for lunch at a mexican restaurant I'll go here any day.  The place could use a better cleaning.  The floors are really slick and our table was a bit sticky.  Again, not my first choice but my son loves it.

data.title: Loved the Taco Bowl!
data.text: The food was not bad, just seemed like items should have been a bit more fresher! What I would expect of a fast food spot, just a bit on the pricey side for the quality of food. Also noticed how people would walk in a steal soda, kinda weird! Only place to really eat by the theater tho!

data.title: Not great
data.text: Good was ok. Lots of spices so flavor is all over the place. Couldn't understand a word anyone said. Trying to shuffle you through the line as fast as they can. Won't be back.

data.title: Fast Food and Fast service
data.text: Food was served quickly and was quite tasty.  Had just checked in to Homewood Suites just around the corner from Qdoba and needed to eat quickly  because I had picked up my granddaughter  from the Citadel and she was starving. I had never eaten at a Qdoba before and she chose to eat there because she had eaten there with her Mom and Dad. I was pleasantly surprised.  I will eat there again and would recommend it to any of my friends and anyone else traveling in that area of North Charleston, SC.

data.title: tasty fast food
data.text: Even though my kids don't like the food here so much, I do. It tastes pretty good, and I can get it quickly. I would rather eat here than at a fast food burger place or Taco Bell. The food tastes fresh and has lots of flavor. The staff is very nice. I look forward to going back again.

data.title: Great food!
data.text: The Mexican gumbo is delicious.  Our family of four enjoys the convenience of a quick weeknight dinner that is  filling and good.

data.title: TexMex Fast Food
data.text:
Really... not a Moes or other on-your-feet Mexican fast food place... OMG the food trucks do a better job.. but alas, we were there with no other viable choices around.  Hate eating at a Mexican when the standard of care is ..... free chips and salsa.  Here your meal came without.

Yeah, they prepare it to order in front of you.. but nothing you can't really do at home after some smart shopping at your local grocery store.  I usually expect more when I decide to eat out.

If your only option is for a very quick bite to eat on the run, well this place beats most fast food chains, but if you have the time to sit down, opt for a mom-and-pop traditional TexMex restaurant, that offers some complimentary chips & salsa.

SaleebScore:  Service: at the counter 8/10;   Food: 7/10;   Value 6/10;  Atmosphere 4/10

data.title: Better than I expected but prefer chiptole
data.text: I've come here a couple times since it's close. It got good selections and toppings for a burrito place. It's kind of just like a chiptole but I prefer chiptole. If you like burritos though you should check it out. It's in a nice location with the movie theater a hundred yards away. Friendly staff as well

data.title: Love the Food and Manager
data.text: Qdoba at the Towne Center needs to be very proud of their manager in that location.  Not only is the food amazingly fresh, the manager there is so nice and personable.   She remembers me when I come in and always has a smile on her face.  I have used her friendliness as an example for my teenager when we eat there and how they have themselves a great manager working there.

data.title: Really good lunch spot
data.text: Needing a quick lunch for our party of seven, including three hungry teens, we stopped at Qdobo.  We had never heard of the chain, but it looked like a Chipotle, which would be safe. It was a good choice.  It was very much like Chipotle, serving burritos, tacos, etc.  I had a taco salad bowl which was very fresh and very tasty.  The rest of our party dug into tacos and overstuffed burritos.  I will certainly look for this chain in future travels.

data.title: LOVE IT!!
data.text: I love Qdoba's food, but the service here is awesome.  It started from the moment we walked in the door.  The food was juicy and fresh.  Samples were given of the new flavors and sauces.
